text: We are at Mugi to learn how to make delicious monjayaki!
I'll do my best!
Mastering Monjayaki, Tip 2!  I shall master the techniques directly given by a professional!
The popular menu is...
All of them are good!
It's all set now!
And, at last, it's time for the final showdown!
Tonight, I am having a date with a very beautiful woman!
Her name is Miss Roza.
Well, she is not my girlfriend...
She is a really lovely actress who my foodie friend Introduced to me.
In order to have her enjoy monjayaki for the very first time, I organized the Yakatabune boat date.
Mr. Nishiguchi is the boss of this boat.
Please recommend us night view spots!
Alright!  I am going to hand her my souvenir with the night view.
But before that, we shall have a meal.
Leave it to me this time!
Hey... What is the matter?  What shall I do?
Wow, Miss Roza!
She's really good, although it's her first time!
Let's eat!
Now is a chance to give her my souvenir!
Whether we actually kissed or not is a secret only between us.
I must go now.  Chef is waiting for me!
